item.title: Math, cow shelter on govt land evicted for housing scheme project in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: The district authorities on Tuesday evicted the Mruthyunjaya Math and cow shelter at Yeganoor village in the taluk, as it was allegedly built on government land. The math and cow shelter was built on a four-acre piece of land.
The authorities took up the eviction drive at a time when the math head Jnananda Swami is way at Prayagraj for the Maha Kumbh Mela. The eviction driver was carried out despite opposition from the villagers.
The eviction driver was carried out under the supervisi...]]>
